title: National Merit Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹50,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Open to students with 85%+ in Class 12
- **Application Deadline:** 30th September
- **Selection Criteria:** Academic performance and financial need.

title: State Excellence Award
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹30,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Available for students securing 90%+ in board exams
- **Application Deadline:** 15th August
- **Selection Criteria:** Academic merit and extracurricular achievements.

title: Minority Student Grant
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹20,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Open to students from minority communities with financial need
- **Application Deadline:** 10th October
- **Selection Criteria:** Financial background and academic performance.

title: Women in STEM Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹60,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Female students pursuing STEM degrees
- **Application Deadline:** 5th December
- **Selection Criteria:** Academic record and passion for STEM fields.

title: Tribal Welfare Grant
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹25,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Reserved for students belonging to Scheduled Tribes
- **Application Deadline:** 20th July
- **Selection Criteria:** Tribal status and academic merit.

title: Sports Excellence Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹35,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students excelling in sports at national or state levels
- **Application Deadline:** 1st November
- **Selection Criteria:** Sports achievements and academic record.

title: Engineering Bright Future Fund
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹45,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students pursuing engineering with 80%+ in Class 12
- **Application Deadline:** 12th September
- **Selection Criteria:** Academic excellence and financial need.

title: Medical Career Advancement Fund
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹60,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Medical students with outstanding academic records
- **Application Deadline:** 30th June
- **Selection Criteria:** Entrance exam rank and financial need.

title: Rural Development Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹30,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students from rural backgrounds pursuing higher education
- **Application Deadline:** 18th October
- **Selection Criteria:** Economic background and academic merit.

title: Social Work Leadership Award
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹20,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students pursuing degrees in social work
- **Application Deadline:** 15th September
- **Selection Criteria:** Passion for social work and financial need.

title: Science and Research Grant
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹50,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students pursuing science and research fields
- **Application Deadline:** 5th April
- **Selection Criteria:** Research proposal and academic excellence.

title: Arts and Humanities Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹30,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students enrolled in arts and humanities courses
- **Application Deadline:** 10th May
- **Selection Criteria:** Portfolio review and academic merit.

title: Future Innovators Award
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹70,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students with innovative project ideas in technology
- **Application Deadline:** 15th July
- **Selection Criteria:** Project feasibility and academic performance.

title: Merit-Based Business Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹40,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Business students with strong leadership potential
- **Application Deadline:** 20th August
- **Selection Criteria:** Leadership experience and academic record.

title: Engineering Excellence Grant
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹55,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Engineering students with outstanding academic records
- **Application Deadline:** 30th June
- **Selection Criteria:** Academic performance and innovation in engineering.

title: Healthcare Future Leaders Fund
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹60,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Medical students with a commitment to community service
- **Application Deadline:** 12th September
- **Selection Criteria:** Medical entrance exam score and service experience.

title: Emerging Entrepreneurs Award
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹25,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students developing startup ideas
- **Application Deadline:** 1st November
- **Selection Criteria:** Business plan and innovation potential.

title: Sustainable Development Grant
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹30,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Students working on sustainability projects
- **Application Deadline:** 18th October
- **Selection Criteria:** Project impact and academic merit.

title: Law and Justice Scholarship
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹40,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Law students with a passion for social justice
- **Application Deadline:** 25th March
- **Selection Criteria:** Commitment to justice and academic record.

title: Women Empowerment Award
description:
### Scholarship Details
- **Amount:** ₹60,000 per year
- **Eligibility:** Female students excelling in leadership and academics
- **Application Deadline:** 5th December
- **Selection Criteria:** Leadership experience and academic excellence.
